high_descs: Turn right and walk to the desk then turn right and walk to the chair.
Pick up the pencil on your left closest to you.
Turn around and take two steps then turn right so you're facing the small garbage can.
Put the pencil in the aforementioned garbage.
anns.task_desc: Put a pencil in the garbage.

high_descs: move to the wood desk top closest to the desk chair
Pick up the blue pencil in front of the desk chair on top of the desk
Carry the pencil over to the trash can on the left side of the desk on the floor
Place the pencil in the trash bin
anns.task_desc: Move a pencil to the trash

high_descs: Move to the desk in front of the window
Pick up a pencil from the desk
Move to the bin to the left of the desk
Place the pencil inside the bin
anns.task_desc: Put a pencil in the bin.
